welcome_message_body: Welcome to Puerto Plata! Get ready to be charmed by the city's beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and historic architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Puerto Plata has to offer.

restaurants.name: jamvi's
restaurants.description: jamvi's is a caribbean restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Union Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at La Union Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
